item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

[quote=“DePredaTe, post:16, topic:190649”]You need to learn how to spell to. I know everyone doesn’t like typing like me, but seriously, come on. I think you can do a little better than that.
I believe what fresh said was dumb, immature, and most of all, disrespectful. He needs to leave.

I believe that you shouldn’t, and won’t want to host it on your computer. When people start to get jealous because there server sucks, and yours is good, they tend to want to try to break your server. As in flooding it and trying to shut it down for good. Get another computer that you won’t use much, and host it on there so if it gets ruined, you don’t have to worry about getting yourself a new computer cause of some noob breaking your computer. Remember though, always save your files on your computer, then host it on another. This way you don’t lose your files if the other computer is broken.[/quote]

They can’t break you computer. All they can do is lagg the hell outta it and crash your server.
Also if you want a good server it must be SQL and have more then one world.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @DePredaTe DePredaTe
item.description:
@DePredaTe wrote:

You need to learn how to spell to. I know everyone doesn’t like typing like me, but seriously, come on. I think you can do a little better than that.
I believe what fresh said was dumb, immature, and most of all, disrespectful. He needs to leave.

I believe that you shouldn’t, and won’t want to host it on your computer. When people start to get jealous because there server sucks, and yours is good, they tend to want to try to break your server. As in flooding it and trying to shut it down for good. Get another computer that you won’t use much, and host it on there so if it gets ruined, you don’t have to worry about getting yourself a new computer cause of some noob breaking your computer. Remember though, always save your files on your computer, then host it on another. This way you don’t lose your files if the other computer is broken.

Read full topic
